page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: Our area is situated between the city of{Exeter}and the seaside town of {Exmouth.}The land is basically rural,hilly and primarily used for {farming.}However,on the East side of the area there is common land which is used by the ECC,for a quarry,and the Royal Marines,for training purposes. {The population is small}with the majority centring around{Woodbury.} The area is adequately served by 2 "B" roads and several country lanes. The area is not on any major routes. The only{historical remains}in the area are 2 tumuli on the common. {Tourism}is catered for with several B&B properties and 2 caravan sites along with car parks on the common. {St. Peter's Preparatory School}is sited in our block but serves a much wider area.The School is the largest employer in the area.
